intro: This design will give you a place to keep your phone and wallet so you always know where it is. All you need to make this design is a computer and a 3D printer.
intro_items: This design will give you a place to keep your phone and wallet so you always know where it is. All you need to make this design is a computer and a 3D printer.

etapes.html:
1. Step 1: Step One

Étapes :

  1. The first step is to get a rectangular box and stretch it out so your phone case can fit on it. You want to use a ruler to find out the size of your phone. Once you find the size of the box that will be able to hold the phone than you want to put the rectangular box at an angle.

2. Step 2: Step Two

Étapes :

  1. The second step is to create the base of what the phone will sit on. So, you want to get a box and then find the dimensions of the bottom of your phone. You want to make it so the base will fit the bottom of your phone. You want to then attach the piece you just made to the bottom of the slanted rectangle that your phone will lean against.

3. Step 3: Step 3

Étapes :

  1. The next step is to create a stopper so that your phone does not slip off the base. The stopper should be the same size as the base so you want to get a box and make it the same size as the base. You want to make the rectangle skinny. Once you make the rectangle, put it at the front of the base and at the top so it sticks out. This piece will make sure your phone does not slide forward.

4. Step 4: Step 4

Étapes :

  1. Step 4 is the easiest step and it includes removing the bottom of the design. This step is important because it helps the piece stay sturdy on a surface and not wobble around.

5. Step 5: Step 5

Étapes :

  1. Step 5 includes making the stand where the wallet holder will go. This piece will also keep the phone holder up. You want to grab a square and make it the same width as the phone holder. Then, put it at a wide angle. You want this piece to be touching the editing bed and towards the top of the phone stand.

6. Step 6: Final Step.

Étapes :

  1. During the final step you want to add two boxes. For the first box, you want to measure your wallet to get the dimensions of your wallet. Depending on how big it is, you want to make the base of where the wallet will rest on bigger. Also, if you have a tall wallet then you want to move the box lower so your wallet will fit. Then, with the second box you want to put it at the end of the box that you just made so that the wallet will be secure and not accidentally slide out. You then want to take a whole box and put it under the work space. Once you do this, you want to combine all the pieces together. This will make sure that the piece is not wobbly. We are just repeating the same step we did for the phone stand part.

7. Step 7: Final Step

Étapes :

  1. The final step is to connect the piece that the wallet will hold and the piece that will hold the phone.
8. Step 8: Product
